tool_description: API providing access to various data related to police services in the UK, including crime data, police force details, and stop and search information.
title: Data Police UK API

api_list.name: available_datasets
api_list.description: Returns a list of available datasets.

api_list.name: list_forces
api_list.description: Returns a list of all police forces available via the API except the British Transport Police.

api_list.name: specific_force
api_list.description: Returns detailed information about a specific police force given its ID.

api_list.name: force_senior_officers
api_list.description: Returns a list of senior officers for a specific police force given its ID.

api_list.name: street_level_crimes
api_list.description: Returns crimes at street-level for a given latitude and longitude, optionally limited to a specific date.

api_list.name: crimes_at_location
api_list.description: Returns crimes which occurred at a specified location ID or nearest pre-defined location for given latitude/longitude.

api_list.name: crimes_with_no_location
api_list.description: Returns a list of crimes that could not be mapped to a location.

api_list.name: crime_categories
api_list.description: Returns a list of valid crime categories for a given date.

api_list.name: crime_last_updated
api_list.description: Returns the date when the crime data was last updated.

api_list.name: outcomes_for_specific_crime
api_list.description: Returns the outcomes for a specific crime by its crime ID.

api_list.name: neighbourhoods_by_force
api_list.description: Returns a list of neighbourhoods for a specified police force.

api_list.name: specific_neighbourhood
api_list.description: Returns detailed information about a specific neighbourhood in a police force.

api_list.name: neighbourhood_boundary
api_list.description: Returns a list of latitude/longitude pairs that make up the boundary of a neighbourhood.

api_list.name: neighbourhood_teams
api_list.description: Returns a list of team members for a specific neighbourhood in a police force.

api_list.name: neighbourhood_events
api_list.description: Returns a list of upcoming events for a specific neighbourhood in a police force.

api_list.name: neighbourhood_priorities
api_list.description: Returns a list of priorities for a specific neighbourhood in a police force.

api_list.name: locate_neighbourhood
api_list.description: Finds the neighbourhood policing team responsible for a particular area based on latitude and longitude.

api_list.name: stop_and_searches_by_area
api_list.description: Returns stop and searches at street-level for a given latitude and longitude or within a custom area.

api_list.name: stop_and_searches_by_location
api_list.description: Returns stop and searches at a particular location ID, optionally limited to a specific date.

api_list.name: stop_and_searches_no_location
api_list.description: Returns stop and searches that could not be mapped to a location for a specific force.

api_list.name: stop_and_searches_by_force
api_list.description: Returns stop and searches reported by a particular force, optionally limited to a specific date.
